name: Qlikview Online Training Demo
content: Intellipaat is organizing a free demo for Online Qlikview Training.This online Demo Will Help you to learn modeling, visualization, reports and dashboards. What will you learn in this QlikView course? Implementing QlikView data modeling, visualization and reporting Creating QVD files in QlikView Desktop Steps of transformation Data and BI visualization with QlikView Creating different types of charts and integrating them in dashboard for analysis Before joining the event, you should know About Qlikview Certification Fee Resources Qlikview tutorial Qlikview Interview Questions
